metadata.name: live something over that gleam - rough 1
metadata.description: Draw of what I want to express. I don't decide whether I draw a male or a female, I draw as I go with my brush and I don't always care about the gender of the characters. I hope people feel a sense of excitement that cannot be expressed in words.

attributes.value: MITSUI FUDOSAN 80th Anniversary FUTURE SPECIAL ZONE PROJECT
